price: 57. Hubaal Kuway cabsida Rabbigood ku weyn tahay;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
